name: Only Human (Lady_C, ChrisVifzack)
description:
It's your first day at your new school! Unfortunately, it is a robot school. Where robots (try) to learn magic. You are the only human! Will you be better than them?

How to play:

Just click on the choices. Don't forget to scroll down to see all of them!

For the puzzles, drag and drop on the target!

-----------------------------------

If you like it, please consider voting for us at the InkJam!

You can also check the other submissions here.

-----------------------------------

Drop us a comment to tell us how many puzzles you solved!

-----------------------------------

Game made using Ink and Godot.

Submission for the InkJam 2021.

Theme: "You'll think of something."

-----------------------------------

Story by Lady_C | @LOfTheInternet

Artwork & Programming by ChrisVifzack | @ChrisVifzack
